Text: But I guess he really \n cares about his \n daughter.
Daddy...
Aww, come on! You were \n supposed to wait for me.

How can I have a 
 heart-to-heart when 
 she's being 
 unreasonable!?
If he was all bad, he \n wouldn't have let \n her be happy.
Elena!!! Come back \n to your dad!
Dad...
How could a man from \n Elgona possibly make my \n Elena happy?

I have to keep tracking 
 her down and dragging 
 her back home for her 
 own good.
Sheesh, give it a rest!
I'll go get your \n daughter and bring her \n back so you can talk.
This time she left a \n letter...
H-How dare you-
Argh! Where'd they go!?
Dad, I promise I'll do \n whatever I can to make \n your daughter happy.
You know, it might help \n me help you if you told \n me what was going on.
But you protected her.
You messed \n everything up!
W-Wait!

Don't you go 
 calling me "Dad"! 
 I'm no poor 
 man's father.
You wait here.
My beloved daughter is \n running around with some \n ne'er-do-well!
It's Dad, run!
I thought for sure you'd \n abandon my daughter \n when times got tough.
There's no point \n talking, let's go.
Said, "We're eloping."

Now's not the time 
 to argue! I can't 
 bear to let anything 
 happen to you.
What are you two \n doing? Just get \n out of here!
Work!? What now!?
Anyway, it doesn't \n matter what you do. \n We're in love!
Worse, he's one of the \n people from Elgona.
I thought that old guy \n didn't have a loving \n bone in his body...
Dad...
But-
Scarabs! \n Take the lovebirds \n and run.
Maybe your daughter left \n because of you?
Fine, fine, \n heart-to-heart, \n just hurry up!
Don't move, I'm coming \n over there!

You don't listen to 
 people, you're always 
 barking orders, you're 
 judgemental...
I'll buy you time!
Stay out of this! What \n would you know about \n my daughter?

If I make any sudden 
 movements, she'll know 
 he sent me. I should try 
 walking.
You promised. \n Heart-to-heart, \n remember?
Lad, you take her! \n Hey, monster, \n it's me you want!
Phew, almost caught me. \n I think she knows her \n dad's close.
I'm sorry! It's just, I \n can't help looking over \n my shoulder for my dad.
She's a smart girl, \n she won't be easy \n to convince.
She's being taken in. \n He's after the family \n fortune, I know it.
Thank you for using \n Black Cat Transport \n today!
I'm not going \n anywhere with you!
Oh shoot, I forgot to \n get paid!
Elena, with me!
I'll pay you, but you \n better take a good one!
She told you she loved \n him, right?
Catch her! We can't lose \n her again.
Haha, okay, everyone \n line up.
Take our family picture. \n That's my future \n son-in-law.
You never know, they \n could just be in love.
Dad... You actually \n hired someone to bring \n me back?
Ah! I see them!
Dad, take \n Elena and go!
I know he's behind all \n of this! He better give \n me back my daughter!
Would you relax? \n No one's here.
She knew I'd come after \n her, so she sabotaged \n the private yacht.
You need to go!
I may have been quick to \n judge you just because \n you're from Elgona.
There you go, one \n awesome family picture.
What are you doing just \n standing there!? Get to \n work.
Who are you!?
Lucky guess...
Old guy...
H-How did you know my \n daughter said all that \n about me?
Imagine that! An Elgona \n man with designs on my \n little girl!
I knew it, he'll never \n change.
N-Never mind, just get \n her back for me.
She says she loves him, \n but that's ridiculous.
Promise me you'll have a \n proper heart-to-heart \n with her?
You know, even if we \n catch her, she's just \n gonna run off again.
Grab the Client and \n Chase the Bike
I can't do what you're \n asking!
I said I'd pay whatever \n you wanted!
I'm famous in Lei \n Havina, you know! Now \n fetch me that airboat.
What's got him so upset?
Our boats run on a very \n strict schedule, we \n can't change that.
Can't is for little \n people. You better do \n what I tell you!
Wait, that's that \n nasty old guy I \n met in Elgona.
Hey, guy, maybe you \n should calm down.
Hah!? Oh, you...
Hmm... You're just what \n I need.
I no longer need you and \n your boat. Shoo!
Gladly!
Did I lose them?
Take the Man Where \n He Wants to Go
Rich Man: \n Elena, don't do this to me. This is all that young punk's fault!
Take the Man Someplace \n With a Better View
A place with a good view... Maybe over there?
Rich Man: \n When I get my hands on that little punk...
Rich Man: \n They went down there. Drop me off.
Take the Man \n To His Daughter
Rich Man: \n Don't leave me behind!
She'll see me!
Rich Man: \n Come on, come on, earn your pay!
Rich Man: \n You've got to be kidding me!?
Rich Man: \n Hmm... There, head over to that island!
Rich Man: \n They've got too much luggage, they've got to change vehicles.
Rich Man: \n Don't get too close, drop me off a little away from them.
Rich Man: \n Where are you going? After that bike!
I need to take the guy with me.
Nothing over this way.
I need to take the guy with me.
I need to catch his daughter.
Hmph, young people just \n don't understand how the \n world works.
Well, well, looks like \n you're my new ride.
I can take you wherever \n you wanna go, but it'll \n cost you.
Hmph, I should've \n expected you'd be after \n my money.

I've got a very big 
 mouth to feed back in 
 the settlement, I need 
 whatever I can get.
Yeah, yeah, save your \n "I'm poor" sob story \n for someone who cares.
Rrrr... \n It's getting tough \n to stand this guy.
Are you paying or not!?
Fine, fine, I'll pay you \n what you deserve if you \n get the job done.
Don't worry, \n after I'm done, \n you'll pay up.
So where do \n you want to go?
Hmm... Well, first I'd-
Hah!? Th-That's-!
Follow that bike!
Huh? I thought you \n had somewhere you \n wanted to go.
Just do what I told you! \n We're losing them!
Fine, you're the boss, \n so long as I get \n rewarded for this.
We lost them! \n Some help you were.
S-Sorry.
Save your apologies, \n just take me over to \n that island.
Y-Yeah, sure.
I'm getting real tired \n of this guy looking \n down his nose at me...
Tch! Not here either...
Didn't this guy \n have some place he \n wanted to go!?
If you were trying to \n find those two people on \n the bike-
Quiet! Just follow my \n orders!
Take me to a place where \n I can get a good look \n around!
Yeah, yeah.
Sneak up on the Man's \n Daughter and Catch Her
Now I just have to get in close...
Lhaogulls!
Did she see me!?
Almost got her...
Grab the Woman in a \n Stasis Field
Gotcha!
Rich Young Woman: \n What are you doing!?
Rich Man: \n Well done! You got her.
Rich Young Woman: \n Dad!?
Rich Man: \n What are you doing? She's that way!
Stupid birds ruined my chance!
She spotted me!
Rich Young Woman: \n Daddy?
Rich Young Woman: \n Hm?
Rich Young Woman: \n Is someone there?
Rich Young Woman: \n Who are you!?
I've got to grab that girl.
Nothing over this way.
Defeat the Nevi
He can help his daughter while I take out the Nevi.
That's all of 'em.
Defeat the Nevi
Take a Picture of the Trio
A little closer now. Ready?
I've gotta take their picture!
I have to snap the picture when they're facing me.
I have to get all three of them in the frame.
Nice picture!
I need to make sure they're all facing me.
Hmm, seems a little far away.
I have to take care of those Nevi!
Think I'm a little too close on this one.
I don't think they want me in the shot...
I should get back to what I was doing.
